alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 6:37AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...HEAVY LAKE EFFECT RAIN WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LEWIS AND OSWEGO COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM EDT... At 634 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a band of heavy lake effect rain from near Oswego eastward across southern and central Oswego County and southwest Lewis County. This band of rain will remain nearly stationary through 8AM, then begin to drift north and east by mid morning. HAZARD...Heavy lake effect rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain will result in ponding of water in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Oswego, Fulton, Pulaski, Central Square, Redfield, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, West Monroe, Palermo, New Haven, Minetto, Mexico, Williamstown, Orwell, and Parish. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this band of lake effect rain and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
